LanguageData.SpinalCordParalysis.label: paralysis
LanguageData.SpinalCordParalysis.description: Damage of spinal cord caused irrepairable movement disability, ranging from sensory loss to complete loss of movement. Paralysis is often a life-changing condition and may require the use of bionic implants or prosthetics to restore function.
LanguageData.SpinalCordParalysis.stages.partial.label: partial
LanguageData.SpinalCordParalysis.stages.full.label: full
